013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
018import java.text.*;
019import java.util.*;
020import java.util.function.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
024
025/**
026 * ContextSession that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link BeanTraverseContext}.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * Used by serializers and other classes that traverse POJOs for the following purposes:
030 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
031 *    <li>
032 *       Keeping track of how deep it is in a model for indentation purposes.
033 *    <li>
034 *       Ensuring infinite loops don't occur by setting a limit on how deep to traverse a model.
035 *    <li>
036 *       Ensuring infinite loops don't occur from loops in the model (when detectRecursions is enabled.
037 * </ul>
038 *
039 * <ul class='notes'>
040 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
041 * </ul>
042 *
043 * <ul class='seealso'>
044 * </ul>
045 */
046public class BeanTraverseSession extends BeanSession {
047
048   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
049   // Builder
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051
052   /**
053    * Builder class.
054    */
055   @FluentSetters
056   public static abstract class Builder extends BeanSession.Builder {
057
058      BeanTraverseContext ctx;
059      int initialDepth;
060
061      /**
062       * Constructor
063       *
064       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
065       */
066      protected Builder(BeanTraverseContext ctx) {
067         super(ctx.getBeanContext());
068         this.ctx = ctx;
069         initialDepth = ctx.initialDepth;
070      }
071
072      // <FluentSetters>
073
074      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
075      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
076         super.apply(type, apply);
077         return this;
078      }
079
080      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
081      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
082         super.debug(value);
083         return this;
084      }
085
086      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
087      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
088         super.properties(value);
089         return this;
090      }
091
092      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
093      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
094         super.property(key, value);
095         return this;
096      }
097
098      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
099      public Builder unmodifiable() {
100         super.unmodifiable();
101         return this;
102      }
103
104      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
105      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
106         super.locale(value);
107         return this;
108      }
109
110      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
111      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
112         super.localeDefault(value);
113         return this;
114      }
115
116      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
117      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
118         super.mediaType(value);
119         return this;
120      }
121
122      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
123      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
124         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
125         return this;
126      }
127
128      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
129      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
130         super.timeZone(value);
131         return this;
132      }
133
134      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
135      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
136         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
137         return this;
138      }
139
140      // </FluentSetters>
141   }
142
143   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
144   // Instance
145   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
146
147   private final BeanTraverseContext ctx;
148   private final Map<Object,Object> set;                                           // Contains the current objects in the current branch of the model.
149   private final LinkedList<StackElement> stack = new LinkedList<>();              // Contains the current objects in the current branch of the model.
150
151   // Writable properties
152   private boolean isBottom;                                                       // If 'true', then we're at a leaf in the model (i.e. a String, Number, Boolean, or null).
153   private BeanPropertyMeta currentProperty;
154   private ClassMeta<?> currentClass;
155
156   /** The current indentation depth into the model. */
157   public int indent;
158
159   private int depth;
160
161   /**
162    * Constructor.
163    *
164    * @param builder The builder for this object.
165    */
166   protected BeanTraverseSession(Builder builder) {
167      super(builder);
168      ctx = builder.ctx;
169      indent =  builder.initialDepth;
170      if (isDetectRecursions() || isDebug()) {
171         set = new IdentityHashMap<>();
172      } else {
173         set = Collections.emptyMap();
174      }
175   }
176
177   /**
178    * Sets the current bean property being traversed for proper error messages.
179    *
180    * @param currentProperty The current property being traversed.
181    */
182   protected final void setCurrentProperty(BeanPropertyMeta currentProperty) {
183      this.currentProperty = currentProperty;
184   }
185
186   /**
187    * Sets the current class being traversed for proper error messages.
188    *
189    * @param currentClass The current class being traversed.
190    */
191   protected final void setCurrentClass(ClassMeta<?> currentClass) {
192      this.currentClass = currentClass;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Push the specified object onto the stack.
197    *
198    * @param attrName The attribute name.
199    * @param o The current object being traversed.
200    * @param eType The expected class type.
201    * @return
202    *    The {@link ClassMeta} of the object so that <c>instanceof</c> operations only need to be performed
203    *    once (since they can be expensive).
204    * @throws BeanRecursionException If recursion occurred.
205    */
206   protected final ClassMeta<?> push(String attrName, Object o, ClassMeta<?> eType) throws BeanRecursionException {
207      indent++;
208      depth++;
209      isBottom = true;
210      if (o == null)
211         return null;
212      Class<?> c = o.getClass();
213      ClassMeta<?> cm = (eType != null && c == eType.getInnerClass()) ? eType : ((o instanceof ClassMeta) ? (ClassMeta<?>)o : getClassMeta(c));
214      if (cm.isCharSequence() || cm.isNumber() || cm.isBoolean())
215         return cm;
216      if (depth > getMaxDepth())
217         return null;
218      if (isDetectRecursions() || isDebug()) {
219         if (willRecurse(attrName, o, cm))
220            return null;
221         isBottom = false;
222         stack.add(new StackElement(stack.size(), attrName, o, cm));
223         set.put(o, o);
224      }
225      return cm;
226   }
227
228   /**
229    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if we're processing the root node.
230    *
231    * <p>
232    * Must be called after {@link #push(String, Object, ClassMeta)} and before {@link #pop()}.
233    *
234    * @return <jk>true</jk> if we're processing the root node.
235    */
236   protected final boolean isRoot() {
237      return depth == 1;
238   }
239
240   /**
241    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if {@link BeanTraverseContext.Builder#detectRecursions()} is enabled, and the specified
242    * object is already higher up in the traversal chain.
243    *
244    * @param attrName The bean property attribute name, or some other identifier.
245    * @param o The object to check for recursion.
246    * @param cm The metadata on the object class.
247    * @return <jk>true</jk> if recursion detected.
248    * @throws BeanRecursionException If recursion occurred.
249    */
250   protected final boolean willRecurse(String attrName, Object o, ClassMeta<?> cm) throws BeanRecursionException {
251      if (! (isDetectRecursions() || isDebug()) || ! set.containsKey(o))
252         return false;
253      if (isIgnoreRecursions() && ! isDebug())
254         return true;
255
256      stack.add(new StackElement(stack.size(), attrName, o, cm));
257      throw new BeanRecursionException("Recursion occurred, stack={0}", getStack(true));
258   }
259
260   /**
261    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if we're about to exceed the max depth for the document.
262    *
263    * @return <jk>true</jk> if we're about to exceed the max depth for the document.
264    */
265   protected final boolean willExceedDepth() {
266      return (depth >= getMaxDepth());
267   }
268
269   /**
270    * Pop an object off the stack.
271    */
272   protected final void pop() {
273      indent--;
274      depth--;
275      if ((isDetectRecursions() || isDebug()) && ! isBottom)  {
276         Object o = stack.removeLast().o;
277         Object o2 = set.remove(o);
278         if (o2 == null)
279            onError(null, "Couldn't remove object of type ''{0}'' on attribute ''{1}'' from object stack.", className(o), stack);
280      }
281      isBottom = false;
282   }
283
284   /**
285    * Same as {@link ClassMeta#isOptional()} but gracefully handles a null {@link ClassMeta}.
286    *
287    * @param cm The meta to check.
288    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the specified meta is an {@link Optional}.
289    */
290   protected final boolean isOptional(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
291      return (cm != null && cm.isOptional());
292   }
293
294   /**
295    * Returns the inner type of an {@link Optional}.
296    *
297    * @param cm The meta to check.
298    * @return The inner type of an {@link Optional}.
299    */
300   protected final ClassMeta<?> getOptionalType(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
301      if (cm.isOptional())
302         return getOptionalType(cm.getElementType());
303      return cm;
304   }
305
306   /**
307    * If the specified object is an {@link Optional}, returns the inner object.
308    *
309    * @param o The object to check.
310    * @return The inner object if it's an {@link Optional}, <jk>null</jk> if it's <jk>null</jk>, or else the same object.
311    */
312   protected final Object getOptionalValue(Object o) {
313      if (o == null)
314         return null;
315      if (o instanceof Optional)
316         return getOptionalValue(((Optional<?>)o).orElse(null));
317      return o;
318   }
319
320   /**
321    * Logs a warning message.
322    *
323    * @param t The throwable that was thrown (if there was one).
324    * @param msg The warning message.
325    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments.
326    */
327   protected void onError(Throwable t, String msg, Object... args) {
328      super.addWarning(msg, args);
329   }
330
331   private final class StackElement {
332      final int depth;
333      final String name;
334      final Object o;
335      final ClassMeta<?> aType;
336
337      StackElement(int depth, String name, Object o, ClassMeta<?> aType) {
338         this.depth = depth;
339         this.name = name;
340         this.o = o;
341         this.aType = aType;
342      }
343
344      String toString(boolean simple) {
345         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder().append('[').append(depth).append(']').append(' ');
346         sb.append(isEmpty(name) ? "<noname>" : name).append(':');
347         sb.append(aType.toString(simple));
348         if (aType != aType.getSerializedClassMeta(BeanTraverseSession.this))
349            sb.append('/').append(aType.getSerializedClassMeta(BeanTraverseSession.this).toString(simple));
350         return sb.toString();
351      }
352   }
353
354   /**
355    * Returns the current stack trace.
356    *
357    * @param full
358    *    If <jk>true</jk>, returns a full stack trace.
359    * @return The current stack trace.
360    */
361   protected String getStack(boolean full) {
362      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
363      stack.forEach(x -> {
364         if (full) {
365            sb.append("\n\t");
366            for (int i = 1; i < x.depth; i++)
367               sb.append("  ");
368            if (x.depth > 0)
369               sb.append("->");
370            sb.append(x.toString(false));
371         } else {
372            sb.append(" > ").append(x.toString(true));
373         }
374      });
375      return sb.toString();
376   }
377
378   /**
379    * Returns information used to determine at what location in the parse a failure occurred.
380    *
381    * @return A map, typically containing something like <c>{line:123,column:456,currentProperty:"foobar"}</c>
382    */
383   public final JsonMap getLastLocation() {
384      Predicate<Object> nn = ObjectUtils::isNotNull;
385      Predicate<Collection<?>> nec = CollectionUtils::isNotEmpty;
386      return JsonMap.create()
387         .appendIf(nn, "currentClass", currentClass)
388         .appendIf(nn, "currentProperty", currentProperty)
389         .appendIf(nec, "stack", stack);
390   }
391
392   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
393   // Properties
394   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
395
396   /**
397    * Automatically detect POJO recursions.
398    *
399    * @see BeanTraverseContext.Builder#detectRecursions()
400    * @return
401    *    <jk>true</jk> if recursions should be checked for during traversal.
402    */
403   public final boolean isDetectRecursions() {
404      return ctx.isDetectRecursions();
405   }
406
407   /**
408    * Ignore recursion errors.
409    *
410    * @see BeanTraverseContext.Builder#ignoreRecursions()
411    * @return
412    *    <jk>true</jk> if when we encounter the same object when traversing a tree, we set the value to <jk>null</jk>.
413    *    <br>Otherwise, a {@link BeanRecursionException} is thrown with the message <js>"Recursion occurred, stack=..."</js>.
414    */
415   public final boolean isIgnoreRecursions() {
416      return ctx.isIgnoreRecursions();
417   }
418
419   /**
420    * Initial depth.
421    *
422    * @see BeanTraverseContext.Builder#initialDepth(int)
423    * @return
424    *    The initial indentation level at the root.
425    */
426   public final int getInitialDepth() {
427      return ctx.getInitialDepth();
428   }
429
430   /**
431    * Max traversal depth.
432    *
433    * @see BeanTraverseContext.Builder#maxDepth(int)
434    * @return
435    *    The depth at which traversal is aborted if depth is reached in the POJO tree.
436    * <br>If this depth is exceeded, an exception is thrown.
437    */
438   public final int getMaxDepth() {
439      return ctx.getMaxDepth();
440   }
441
442   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
443   // Other methods
444   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
445
446   @Override /* ContextSession */
447   protected JsonMap properties() {
448      return filteredMap("indent", indent, "depth", depth);
449   }
450}
